message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $120 to start.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $110.  I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll find great value in it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
